name: Pixel (sunteam)
description:
PIXEL is a point-and-click mini adventure game that takes you through 3 distinct 8-bit video game styles; the ZX81, ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64. Each area has a goal and puzzles that must be solved to continue.

I created this game as a way to learn the Adventure Game Studio (AGS) software. It's short and sweet and shouldn't take too long to finish.

CONTROLS
Controls are mouse based - right click cycles through the commands and the title bar contains inventory, options and the facility to save and load.
